body: I always love a good classic bound and restrained slut getting pounded from behind. Great fap. Also Juri's <3

I hate the fact that Juri is on the cover in prime pounding position but she only has THREE PANELS of penetration.  Meanwhile Sakura isn't even on the front or back and she has FIVE.  His last Juri doujin has her on the cover and she's getting absolutely pulverized for seven pages straight.  It's worse than Zunta's Soul Calibur doujin that has Viola predominantly featured and she's only getting plowed for two pages.
